Class CellularData

  • java.lang.Object
    • CellularData

  • public class CellularData
extends Object
    One object of class CellularData represents a table containing the cellular data for all the countries.
    Author:
    Shiva

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CellularData(int numRows, int numColumns, int startingYear)
      Calls the setter methods for initializing the values of the rows, columns, starting year, table, and countryNames.
